page.title: 07Local News
page.content:
The Shenstone Show: Every year in Shenstone there is a small fete on the playing fields. With an arcade, stalls, activites and a bouncy castle. The country dancing is of top quality and the gymnastics display is very good as well. You can buy sweets, icecreams and candys. Every year they have a Tug of War.P.T.A Fun Run: Every year there is a fun run . You may do as many laps as you like. There is a barbaque and bar, Cricket, Rounders and Swimming. (The swimming pool is not that good ). It is very well organised.
D.WALE & R.HOAR
